project

Class FindFluxModules

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.FindFluxModules

  • public class FindFluxModules
extends java.lang.Object
    FindFluxModules calculates the flux modules of a metabolic network.

    Important!!! The class and all its methods are needing the information of the class SBMLLoad(), represented by load!

    Author:
    guru

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> adjacency
      Is a list of lists of the Id's of the reactions of the modules, at which each inner list is one module.
      (package private) double biomassOptValue
      Saves the maximized value of the biomass reaction (optimized by the method optimize()).
      boolean ignore
      If true, the error output is redirected to a file with the choosen path.
      (package private) SBMLLoad load
      Initialized class SBMLLoad.
      (package private) int numV
      Number of variable Reactions.

    • Field Detail

      • load

        SBMLLoad load
        Initialized class SBMLLoad. Commited by the constructor.

      • biomassOptValue

        double biomassOptValue
        Saves the maximized value of the biomass reaction (optimized by the method optimize()).

      • adjacency

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> adjacency
        Is a list of lists of the Id's of the reactions of the modules, at which each inner list is one module.

      • numV

        int numV
        Number of variable Reactions. Is set by computeMinModules

      • ignore

        public boolean ignore
        If true, the error output is redirected to a file with the choosen path.

        Can be set true as a parameter with the start of the program.

    • Method Detail

      • getBiomassOptValue

        public double getBiomassOptValue()
        biomassOptValue is initialize by optimize. Before that, biomassOptValue is null.
        Returns:
        biomassOptValue

      • getAdjacency

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> getAdjacency()
        adjacency is initialize by dfs. Before that, adjacency is null.
        Returns:
        adjacency

      • findFlux

        public void findFlux()
              throws lpsolve.LpSolveException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException
        findFlux() calls all methods in FindFluxModules.java and passes the arguments between them.

        Needs correctly initalised load.

        Throws:
        lpsolve.LpSolveException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printModules

        public void printModules()
        printModules() print the ID's of the modules to the standard output.

        The modules are separated by lines.

        It needs field adjacency and correctly initalised field load.

      • dfs

        public void dfs(boolean[] isVariable,
       scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix dfsArray)
        dfs makes an depth first search over a matrix.

        The results are saved in the class variable adjacency. Needs the correctly initalised field load.

        Parameters:
        isVariable - Array with a boolean value for each reaction, if true, reaction will be not ignored. Computed by minMax
        dfsArray - SparseMatrix with the graph of the minimal modules. Computed by computeMinModules

      • dfsHelp

        private void dfsHelp(int i,
           boolean[] isVariable,
           boolean[] grey,
           scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix dfsArray,
           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> neighbour)
        dfsHelp() exists only for the recursion of dfs().

        Needs correctly initalised field load.

        Parameters:
        i - Which knot is considered at the moment. i is the position in the array with all listed reactions, it is equal with the id's of the reactions in the SBML document.
        isVariable - Array with a boolean value for each reaction, if true, reaction will be not ignored. Computed by minMax
        grey - Marks all visited knots.
        dfsArray - SparseMatrix with the graph of the minimal modules. Computed by computeMinModules
        neighbour - The inner list, that saves the id's of the connected components (modules). In dfs they are added to adjacency.

      • computeMinModules

        public scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix computeMinModules(boolean[] isVariable,
                                            scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix rctMetArr,
                                            scpsolver.lpsolver.LinearProgramSolver solver)
        computeMinModules calculates with linear programming the dependent sets of the stoichiometric vectors of the variable reactions.

        Needs correctly initalised field load.

        Parameters:
        isVariable - Array with a boolean value for each reaction, if true, reaction will be not ignored. Computed by minMax
        rctMetArr - SparseMatrix initialized by matrixBuild. Need to has the length of [number of reactions # number of metabolites].
        solver - SCPSolver
        Returns:
        A SparseMatrix which represents a graph. All reactions are mapped on all reactions. A "1" represents a edge between two reactions, the rest is filled with "0".

      • minMax

        public boolean[] minMax(double[] firstVector,
               scpsolver.lpsolver.LinearProgramSolver solver,
               scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix rctMetArr)
        minMax() execute for all reactions a flux variability analysis.

        The method compares every minimisation value and maximisation value of a flux balance analysis of a reaction. If both values are not equal, the reaction is variable and can be skipped in further computing.

        Needs the correctly initalised field load.

        Parameters:
        firstVector - result vector of optimize
        solver - SCPSolver
        rctMetArr - SparseMatrix initialized by matrixBuild. Need to has the length of [number of reactions # number of metabolites].
        Returns:
        isVariable A boolean array which elements are true for all variable values. It has the length of the number of all reactions.

      • optimize

        public double[] optimize(scpsolver.lpsolver.LinearProgramSolver solver,
                scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix rctMetArr)
                  throws lpsolve.LpSolveException
        optimize() execute a flux balance analysis for the biomass reaction in the model.

        The biomass is being maximized. Needs the correctly initalised field load.

        Parameters:
        solver - SCPSolver
        rctMetArr - SparseMatrix initialized by matrixBuild. Need to has the length of [number of reactions # number of metabolites].
        Returns:
        A double array with the result of the linear programm, which has optimized the biomass.
        Throws:
        lpsolve.LpSolveException

      • matrixBuild

        public scpsolver.util.SparseMatrix matrixBuild()
        matrixBuild() builds a matrix with the stoichiometric values of all reactions.

        Needs the correctly initalised field load.

        Returns:
        A SparseMatrix which stores the stochiometric values for all metabolite of each reaction.

        Shortcut for "System.out.print)
        Parameters:
        s -
